title: What are the Tang Dynasty achievements and inventions? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Tang Dynasty from 618–907 CE is hailed as China’s Golden Age of cultural, literal, and military advancement in the chronicle of Chinese Imperial history. The Tang Dynasty had some of the best poets and literature works created by poets like Li Bai, Dufu, among others. Many of modern elementary poems taught to little children arise from poets and this period. Tang Dynasty also saw the incorporation of foreign music into China, notably from the Turks and the middle east. The Piepa was one of the iconic instruments of the period. Militarily, Since the Han Dynasty the Tang Empire had one of the most powerful armies that withstood barbarian raids, as well as pushed and conquered many minority groups of different cultures and backgrounds. Emperors such as Taizong, Xuanzhong, Xianzhong, Gaozong, and Empress Wu were some of the best military leaders, scholars, and administrators that expanded, stabilized, and gave new life into a newly formed and young empire. China was unified under the Sui, and the Tang kept it unified till 907 CE. The Tang also invented gunpower, of which militarily would become a big factor of warfare during the later Song, Ming, and Qing Dynasties. Chang An, the capital of the Empire for most of the first half of the Tang’s life [620–750] was the cosmopolitian center of the world, where it had the largest population, trade, commerce, and income then any other city of the time. Chinese Eastern Medicine, also expanded and flourished in this period, the stagnation of Han period medicine and knowledge saw a revival and reversement during the Tang period. The Emperor Xuanzhong welcomed many tributaries into China, boostering relations. He also expanded the Civil Service Exams and opened the opportunities to everyone in his empire. The Daming Palace in Chang An, was one of the largest palace structures and complexes in human history, and it lasts for 3/4 of the empire’s existence, serving thousands of people of various backgrounds. There are countless more events, inventions, and accomplishments but these are just those on top of my head right now.
